Sentencas: Bonded compliant seal is a new sealing design for planar solid oxide fuel cell.

Sentencas: During brazing, large residual stresses are generated which have a great effect on failure of the brazing connection.

Sentencas: Therefore, how to decrease the residual stresses is a critical issue for structure integrity.

Sentencas: This paper presents a study on decreasing residual stresses by using short-time creep relaxation effect.

Sentencas: A sequential-coupled calculation model is developed based on finite element method.

Sentencas: The calculated results are verified by neutron diffraction measurements.

Sentencas: During cooling, a short holding time at 600 degrees C is designed to relax the residual stress by creep effect.

Sentencas: The results show that this effect has a remarkable impact on decreasing the residual stress.

Sentencas: The stresses in cell, Ag-CuO and foil have been reduced by about 26.9%, 13.6% and 22.1%, respectively, as the holding time increases up to 40 h. When the holding time exceeds 40 h, the residual stresses remain almost unchanged.

Sentencas: It is thus suggested that the holding time should be reasonably determined to allow sufficient stress relaxation.
